definition: to patrol/to make one's rounds/classifier for rounds of drinks

sentences.english: "Carnival of National Day " was staged in Changsha Windows of the World on Sept. 29.
sentences.chinese: 9月29日，遊客在長沙世界之窗參加水果花車巡遊。

sentences.english: That cloud looks like the fat I put on during the cruise.
sentences.chinese: 那片雲象我在出巡遊期間長出的肥肉。

sentences.english: Flat clappers made of bone or wood originally used by the end man in a minstrel show.
sentences.chinese: 打拍者巡遊演出中站在一端敲擊骨制或木製響板的人。

sentences.english: A number of pleasure cruises still operate from some nearby wharves.
sentences.chinese: 一些高興巡遊仍然運作一些附近碼頭。

sentences.english: At the moment we have our best kids playing at Queens Park Rangers.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我們最好的年輕人都在女王公園巡遊者踢球。

sentences.english: Hong Kong Unison organises a Friendly Parade to promote Racial Harmony.
sentences.chinese: 香港融樂會舉辦和平巡遊，以推廣種族和諧。

sentences.english: The band decided to call it quits after the tour.
sentences.chinese: 這個樂隊在此次巡遊之後打算散夥。

sentences.english: The commemoration of 25 Olinda, including marches and a lot of music.
sentences.chinese: 該奧林達25週年慶祝活動包括巡遊熱鬧的音樂。

sentences.english: Yuan Ding five years, Emperor Li westbound parade to the Dazu County, and the temporary return of the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 元鼎五年，漢武帝西行巡遊到達祖厲縣，臨黃河而返。

sentences.english: To cruise here is like wandering in a natural art gallery.
sentences.chinese: 巡遊於此恍若漫步於大自然的藝術畫廊，美不勝收。

sentences.english: Meeting point is Mai Thai Cruise & Travel in the center of Hua-Hin.
sentences.chinese: 主要景點是湄泰河巡遊和在華欣中心遊覽。

sentences.english: A whitetip reef shark cruises over Great Detached Reef.
sentences.chinese: 一隻白鰭鯊在大離礁海域巡遊。

sentences.english: I could steal a boat or two and go on a real cruise with you.
sentences.chinese: 我可以偷一兩條船，跟你作一次真正的巡遊。

sentences.english: It was a deadly sentiment for the officer of a prowler.
sentences.chinese: 對於一個巡遊者飛船的軍官來說這是一個致命的情緒。

sentences.english: The end man in a minstrel show.
sentences.chinese: 壓軸巡遊演出中的最後藝人。

sentences.english: Many wild animals prowls at night looking for something to eat.
sentences.chinese: 許多野生動物在夜間巡遊來尋找食物。

definition: carnival during the Lantern Festival, with lantern displays and traditional folk performances such as stilt walking and lion dance
colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
